spell_tooltip.description:
Inner Light: Healing spells cost 10% less mana.

Inner Shadow: Spell damage and Atonement healing increased by 10%.

Activate to swap from one effect to the other, incurring a 6 sec cooldown.
Your Power Word: Radiance is now instant cast and the healing is increased by 10%.
15% of all damage you take is stored. The stored amount cannot exceed 12% of your maximum health. The initial damage of your next Shadow Word: Pain deals this stored damage to your target.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 349,524 over 19 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 84,900 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 48,796 Holy damage to enemies and up to 31,248 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 15 sec or until the tendril is killed.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 1.0% Mana.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for 82,833 and reflects 12% of damage absorbed.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 182,825.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 60,941.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 552,463, and applies Atonement for 70% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 50% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to 2 nearby enemies when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 5.8 million, split evenly among them.
Casting Mindbender enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 20% while active.
Shadow Word: Pain deals 5% additional damage and spreads to 1 additional target when you cast Penance to its target.
Atonements granted by Power Word: Shield last an additional 4 sec.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 8% for 4 sec.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 2.8 million Holy damage to enemies or 8.1 million healing to allies over 5.0 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.
Direct critical heals create a protective shield on the target, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Lasts 15 sec.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.

Penance, Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 116,426 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage and lasts 5 sec longer.

Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 5%.

Stacks up to 8 times.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. 

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.

Gain access to a spell that gives you an advantage against your fate.  Premonition rotates to the next spell when cast.

 Premonition of Insight
Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 7 sec.

 Premonition of Piety
Increases your healing done by 20% and causes 70% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec. 

 Premonition of Solace
Your next single target healing spell grants your target a shield that absorbs 2.4 million damage and reduces their damage taken by 15% for 15 sec.

Power Word: Shield absorbs 40% additional damage.

All damage dealt by Penance, Smite and Holy Nova increased by 20%.
Increases the duration of Atonement and Renew by 4 sec.
Premonition causes your next Power Word: Radiance cast to be instant and cost 15% less mana.
Power Word: Shield casts apply 4 stacks of Prayer of Mending to your target.

Your Angelic Feathers increase movement speed by an additional 10%.

When an ally walks through your Angelic Feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect.
Pain Suppression reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Your Flash Heal and Power Word: Shield are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 40 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 40 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
Reduces the cooldown of Premonition by 15 sec.

Casting Premonition of Solace invokes Clairvoyance, expanding your mind and opening up all possibilities of the future.

 Premonition of Clairvoyance
Grants Premonition of Insight, Piety, and Solace at 100% effectiveness.

Void Blast:

Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 251,610 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.

Transform your Shadowfiend or Mindbender into a Voidwraith.

Voidwraith
Summon a Voidwraith for 15 sec that casts Void Flay from afar. Void Flay deals bonus damage to high health enemies, up to a maximum of 50% if they are full health.

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
